subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|人|頃|c1=s|c2=p|t1=man|ls=psc}}. Note that it is not {{Han compound|化|頁}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=qīng
|c=king1
|c-t=ken2,ken1
|c-t_note=ken1 - “to chat”; ken2 - other senses
|h=pfs=khîn
|md=kĭng
|mn=kheng
|mn-t=kuang1/kuêng1
|mn-t_note=kuang1 - Shantou; kuêng1 - Chaozhou
|w=1qin
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=v,a
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[lean]]; to [[tilt]]; to [[incline]]
# to [[collapse]]
# to [[overturn]] and [[pour out]]; to [[empty]]
# to [[do one's best]]; to [[use up]] all of one's [[resource]]s
# to [[adore]]; to [[admire]]
# to [[overpower]]; to [[overwhelm]]
# to [[compete]]
# [[entire]]; [[whole]]
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} to [[chat]]; to [[converse]]
#* {{zh-x|傾 下{haa5} 講 下{haa5}　講 點 至 下嫁|To '''chat''' and talk, talk about how to get married|C|ref={{w2|zh|鄺美雲}} (lyricist {{lang|zh|鄧偉雄}}), {{lang|zh|戀愛專家}}}}
